channel.title: Integromat.com on Daddy's data analysis by Kazu Nozue
channel.description: Recent content in Integromat.com on Daddy's data analysis by Kazu Nozue

item.title: How to make QR code in Google Sheet using Integromat.com.
item.description: How to make QR code in google sheet using Integromat.com. The goal of this section is to create QRcode in Google Sheet by using Intergromat.com1! Outline Create Integromat.com account (free for 100 MB transfer and/or 1000 operation) Link Integromat.com account to your Google accout (for using Google Driv, Sheet) Create a new Google sheet with “sample”,“url”,“QRcode” columns. Create a new Scenario and run once to test it. How to create QRcode generator scenario.

item.title: その実験、再現できなければ意味がない
item.description: 再現できなければ意味がない 数年前、理化学研究所の研究者がNatureに発表した論文が元で1人の自殺者と多額のお金を使った再現性検証実験、多数
